marklogic.body:
I do not think it is opposition to transparency, it seems more like opposition to a cumbersome law. Like the article states it will be difficult for radio ads. Either too much ad time will be Burned up reading Off the top 5 or they will be read so fast no one will understand what is said.
I am all for transparency but it needs to be reasonable.
